detaileddescription.para: Pairing is not supported by the device.
DH Key check did not match.
BR/EDR cross transport key generation not allowed.

description.para: Internal error codes not sent in any SMP PDU.
SMP PDU Code describing command received or sent.
Fixed length of the PDU to be sent.
I/O capabilities codes to be set for SMP_CMD_PAIR_REQ and SMP_CMD_PAIR_RSP
Out-of-Band codes to be set for SMP_CMD_PAIR_REQ and SMP_CMD_PAIR_RSP

detaileddescription.para: No OOB data from the remote device is present.
OOB data from the remote device is present.

description.para: Authentication Requirements Flags to be set for SMP_CMD_PAIR_REQ and SMP_CMD_PAIR_RSP.
Flags of security keys this device is requesting to be distribution once pairing completes.

sectiondef.header: SMP LE Secure Connection Keypress Codes

description.para: Keypress codes found in SMP_CMD_KEYPRESS PDU to be sent on the respective action when the SMP_AUTH_KP_FLAG is set in both the SMP_CMD_PAIR_REQ and SMP_CMD_PAIR_RSP.
Lengths of various keys and values.

detaileddescription.para: Secure connection Diffie-Hellman key check length.

description.para: Input lengths of SMP cryptopgraphic toolbox functions.

briefdescription.para: Security manager constants and definitions from the Bluetooth specification.
